statements: DELETE FROM sensor_data WHERE device_id = 123 AND sensor_type = 'Temperature';
DELETE FROM device_info WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND location = 'Room A';
DELETE FROM sensor_data WHERE id = 10 AND device_id = 5;
DELETE FROM device_info WHERE location = 'Room A' AND last_updated < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Sensors WHERE sensor_name = 'Temperature Sensor' AND reading > 100
DELETE FROM SensorLogs WHERE sensor_id = 1 AND reading_time < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM devices WHERE location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM devices WHERE device_name = 'Device A';
DELETE FROM readings WHERE reading_id = 100 AND value < 50;
